name: Touch the Stars
description:
Louise, Jane, Anna and Tigerlily are perfectly ordinary schoolgirls who lead perfectly ordinary lives...or are they? Ask anyone who knows them and they'll tell you the girls are a bit strange, always asking to be excused from class...

  • Mostly narrative-driven RPG with a twist on the magical girl formula
  • Exciting sandwich-making puzzle you won't get to see because of a game-breaking bug just before it!
  • Extremely cool artwork by my lovely wife
  • Bullet points
  • Maps! As many as some of them!
  • A story you would have really liked if you had been able to see the end of it
